Name: peat moss production, horticultural use | peat moss | EN15804GD, U
Category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/089:Mining and quarrying n.e.c./0892:Extraction of peat
Description: Data collected from Quebec sites were used to represent an average technology. For site opening and annual operations, the specific machinery used by each site are considered. For site closure, a weighted average of five technological options (dry restoration, wet restoration, reforestation, plantation of berries and natural regenaration) was calculated considering the operations of Canadian peat bogs in recent years.
